packages.name: websubhub
packages.summary:
W3C "WebSub" (https://w3c.github.io/websub/) is a recommendation, which facilitates a push-based content delivery / notification mechanism
between publishers and subscribers.

records.name: Acknowledgement
records.description: Record to represent acknowledgement of content updated by the publisher

records.name: ClientConfiguration
records.description: Record to represent client configuration for HubClient / PublisherClient

fields.name: headers
fields.description: Additional Request headers to include when distributing content

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: The content-type of the payload

fields.name: content
fields.description: The payload to be sent

records.name: ContentDistributionMessage
records.description: Record to represent a WebSub content delivery.

fields.name: status
fields.description:
Status of the request processing , this is `200 OK` by default since
this is a success reponse

records.name: ContentDistributionSuccess
records.description: Record to represent the successful WebSub content delivery

fields.name: hub
fields.description: URL of the `hub` where subscriber has subscribed

fields.name: rawRequest
fields.description: Original `HTTP Request`

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: Current `hub` action

fields.name: hubCallback
fields.description: Callback URL for subscriber to receive distributed content

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic to which subscriber has subscribed

fields.name: hubLeaseSeconds
fields.description: Amount of time in seconds during when the subscription is valid

fields.name: hubSecret
fields.description: Secret Key to sign the distributed content

records.name: Subscription
records.description: Record to represent subscription request body

records.name: SubscriptionAccepted
records.description: Record to represent accepted subscription by the `hub`

fields.name: redirectUrls
fields.description: URLs to which subscription has redirected

fields.name: code
fields.description: Status code for action

records.name: SubscriptionPermanentRedirect
records.description: Record to represent permanent subscription redirects

fields.name: redirectUrls
fields.description: URLs to which subscription has redirects

fields.name: code
fields.description: Status code of the action

records.name: SubscriptionTemporaryRedirect
records.description: Record to represent temporary subscription redirects

fields.name: topic
fields.description: `Topic` which should be unregistered from the `hub`

records.name: TopicDeregistration
records.description: Record to represent Topic-Deregistration request body

records.name: TopicDeregistrationSuccess
records.description: Record to represent Topic Deregistration Success

fields.name: topic
fields.description: `Topic` which should be registered in the `hub`

records.name: TopicRegistration
records.description: Record to represent Topic-Registration request body

records.name: TopicRegistrationSuccess
records.description: Record to represent Topic Registration success

fields.name: rawRequest
fields.description: Original `HTTP Reuqest`

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: Current `hub` action

fields.name: hubCallback
fields.description: Callback URL for subscriber to received distributed content

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic from which subscriber wants to unsubscribe

fields.name: hubSecret
fields.description: Secret Key to sign the distributed content

records.name: Unsubscription
records.description: Record to represent the unsubscription request body

fields.name: rawRequest
fields.description: Original `HTTP Request`

fields.name: msgType
fields.description: Type of the content update message

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: Topic to which the content should be updated

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: Content-Type of the update-message

fields.name: content
fields.description: Content to be distributed to subscribers

fields.name: verificationSuccess
fields.description: true / false based on subscription is successfully completed or not

fields.name: verificationSuccess
fields.description: true / false based on unsubscription is successfully completed or not

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: content to be distributed to the topic-subscriber

returnParameters.description:
an `error` if an error occurred or `SubscriptionDeletedError` if the subscriber responded with `HTTP 410` 
or else `ContentDistributionSuccess` for successful content delivery

remoteMethods.name: notifyContentDistribution

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the `websubhub:HubClient`.
```ballerina
    # websubhub:HubClient hubClientEP = new({
    #   hub: "https://hub.com",
    #   hubMode: "subscribe", 
    #   hubCallback: "http://subscriber.com/callback", 
    #   hubTopic: "https://topic.com", 
    #   hubSecret: "key"
    # });
    # ```

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: content to be distributed to the topic-subscriber

returnParameters.description:
an `error` if an error occurred or `SubscriptionDeletedError` if the subscriber responded with `HTTP 410` 
or else `ContentDistributionSuccess` for successful content delivery

methods.name: notifyContentDistribution

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Initializes the `websubhub:HubClient`.
```ballerina
    # websubhub:HubClient hubClientEP = new({
    #   hub: "https://hub.com",
    #   hubMode: "subscribe", 
    #   hubCallback: "http://subscriber.com/callback", 
    #   hubTopic: "https://topic.com", 
    #   hubSecret: "key"
    # });
    # ```

clients.name: HubClient
clients.description: HTTP Based client for WebSub content publishing to subscribers

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to register

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: registerTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Registers a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub against which subscribers can subscribe and the publisher will
publish updates.
```ballerina
    # error? registerTopic = websubHubClientEP->registerTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    # ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to deregister

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred un registering the topic or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: deregisterTopic
remoteMethods.description:
Deregisters a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? deregisterTopic = websubHubClientEP->deregisterTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    #  ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: The update payload

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the update content to set as the `ContentType` header

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the update or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: publishUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Publishes an update to a remote Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? publishUpdate = websubHubClientEP->publishUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com",{"action": "publish",
    # "mode": "remote-hub"});
    #  ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the notification or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: notifyUpdate
remoteMethods.description:
Notifies a remote WebSub Hub from which an update is available to fetch for hubs that require publishing to
happen as such.
```ballerina
    #  error? notifyUpdate = websubHubClientEP->notifyUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    #   ```

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to publish/notify updates

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to register

returnParameters.description: An `error` if an error occurred registering the topic or else `()`

methods.name: registerTopic
methods.description:
Registers a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub against which subscribers can subscribe and the publisher will
publish updates.
```ballerina
    # error? registerTopic = websubHubClientEP->registerTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    # ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic to deregister

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred un registering the topic or else `()`

methods.name: deregisterTopic
methods.description:
Deregisters a topic in a Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? deregisterTopic = websubHubClientEP->deregisterTopic("http://websubpubtopic.com");

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: The update payload

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of the update content to set as the `ContentType` header

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the update or else `()`

methods.name: publishUpdate
methods.description:
Publishes an update to a remote Ballerina WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
    # error? publishUpdate = websubHubClientEP->publishUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com",{"action": "publish",
    # "mode": "remote-hub"});
    #  ```

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: The topic for which the update occurred

returnParameters.description: An `error`if an error occurred with the notification or else `()`

methods.name: notifyUpdate
methods.description:
Notifies a remote WebSub Hub from which an update is available to fetch for hubs that require publishing to
happen as such.
```ballerina
    #  error? notifyUpdate = websubHubClientEP->notifyUpdate("http://websubpubtopic.com");
    #   ```

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to publish/notify updates

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The `websubhub:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client or else `()`

clients.name: PublisherClient
clients.description: The HTTP based client for WebSub topic registration and deregistration, and notifying the hub of new updates.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websubhub:Service` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the service

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `websubhub:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websubhub:Service` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches the provided Service to the Listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches the provided Service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the service

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `websubhub:Listener`. Either an `http:Listener` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The service to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description: Detaches the provided Service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener starting process
An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

otherMethods.name: gracefulStop
otherMethods.description: Gracefully stops the hub listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

errors.name: BadSubscriptionError
errors.description: Error Type representing the errors in subscription request

errors.name: BadUnsubscriptionError
errors.description: Error Type representing the errors in unsubscription request

errors.name: ContentDeliveryError
errors.description: Error Type representing the internal errors in content distribution

errors.name: InternalSubscriptionError
errors.description: Error Type representing the internal errors in subscription action

errors.name: InternalUnsubscriptionError
errors.description: Error Type representing the internal errors in unsubscription action

errors.name: SubscriptionDeletedError
errors.description:
Error Type representing the subscriber ending the subscription 
by sending `HTTP 410` for content delivery response

errors.name: SubscriptionDeniedError
errors.description: Error Type representing the validation errors in subscription request body

errors.name: TopicDeregistrationError
errors.description: Error Type representing the errors in topic unregistration action

errors.name: TopicRegistrationError
errors.description: Error Type representing the errors in topic registration action

errors.name: UnsubscriptionDeniedError
errors.description: Error Type representing the validation errors in unsubscription request body

errors.name: UpdateMessageError
errors.description: Error Type representing the errors in content update request

enums.name: MessageType
enums.description: Enum to differenciate the type of content-update message
